page.title: 11THE POST OFFICE IN BROUGHTON
page.content: THE POST OFFICE IS ON THE HIGH STREET. THERE IS ALSO A GENERAL STORES SECTION. THE BUSIEST DAY OF THE WEEK IS THURSDAY.THE LEAST BUSY DAYS OF THE WEEK ARE MONDAY AND WEDNESDAY.THE BIGGEST PROBLEM IS KEEPING CUSTOMERS SATISFIED.THE POST OFFICE RECEIVES FOUR OR FIVE PARCELS A DAY.FIRST CLASS STAMPS COST 17p AND SECOND CLASS STAMPS COST 13p.THEY MAINLY SELL FIRST CLASS STAMPS.THEY ALSO SELL CARDS IN THE OTHER PART OF THE BUSINESS.THE SUB- POSTMASTER DOES NOT LIVE IN THE SHOP AND THERE ARE NO PROBLEMS AFTER THE SHOP HAS CLOSED. THERE ARE THREE POST BOXES AT: THE HIGH STREET, COXES LANE AND CARTER AVENUE RESPECTIVELY. THERE ARE TWO COLLECTIONS A DAY: AT 9.15 a.m. AND 3.20 p.m.ON EVERY WEEK DAY AND ONE ON SATURDAY MORNING. THERE ARE TWO DELIVERIES EVERY WEEKDAY MORNING AND ONE ON SATURDAY MORNING.
